name: teochew-dictionary-lambda
description: This is a port of [Teochew-Dictionary-Backend](https://github.com/paulronla/Teochew-Dictionary-Backend)  to run on AWS Lambda and written in TypeScript. The intent is to allow  [Teochew Pop-up Dictionary](https://github.com/paulronla/Teochew-Pop-up-Dictionary)  to make up to 50% more "always free" tier requests (from 2 million to 3 million per month).
author: Paul Ron La
